text.section: The Administrator may designate employees of the Investigative Division of the Administration to exercise the powers specified in subsection (b) of this section.

section.section: The issuance of citations under this section shall comply with the requirements of § 26-201 of this article.

text.section:
The Administration shall adopt regulations establishing:
Qualifications for employees appointed under this section including prerequisites of character, training, experience, and education; and
Standards for the performance of the duties assigned to employees appointed under this section.
